alert.note: Alert for Williamson (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 24 at 8:44PM CDT until September 24 at 9:45PM CDT by NWS Austin-San Antonio
info.description: The National Weather Service in Austin San Antonio has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Eastern Williamson County in south central Texas... * Until 945 PM CDT. * At 844 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Holland, or 14 miles northeast of Granger, moving south at 15 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Taylor, Granger, Bartlett, Thrall, Granger Dam, Coupland, Laneport, Hoxie, Beyarsville, Waterloo, Hare, Noack, and Sandoval. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
